segment.source: 4954(S) Windows Firewall Group Policy settings have changed.
segment.target: 4954(S) Windows Firewall Group Policy settings have changed.

segment.source: The new settings have been applied.
segment.target: The new settings have been applied.

segment.source: Describes security event 4954(S) Windows Firewall Group Policy settings have changed.
segment.target: Describes security event 4954(S) Windows Firewall Group Policy settings have changed.

segment.source: 4954(S): Windows Firewall Group Policy settings have changed.
segment.target: 4954(S): Windows Firewall Group Policy settings have changed.

segment.source: The new settings have been applied.
segment.target: The new settings have been applied.

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows Server 2016
segment.target: Windows Server 2016

segment.source: Event Description:
segment.target: Event Description:

segment.source: This event generates every time Windows Firewall group policy is changed, locally or from Active Directory Group Policy.
segment.target: This event generates every time Windows Firewall group policy is changed, locally or from Active Directory Group Policy.

segment.source: This event generates every time local Group Policy is refreshed, even if no Windows Firewall settings were modified or presented.
segment.target: This event generates every time local Group Policy is refreshed, even if no Windows Firewall settings were modified or presented.

segment.source: Note For recommendations, see Security Monitoring Recommendations for this event.
segment.target: Note For recommendations, see Security Monitoring Recommendations for this event.

segment.source: Event XML:
segment.target: Event XML:

segment.source: Required Server Roles: None.
segment.target: Required Server Roles: None.

segment.source: Minimum OS Version: Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista.
segment.target: Minimum OS Version: Windows Server 2008, Windows Vista.

segment.source: Event Versions: 0.
segment.target: Event Versions: 0.

segment.source: Security Monitoring Recommendations
segment.target: Security Monitoring Recommendations

segment.source: For 4954(S): Windows Firewall Group Policy settings have changed.
segment.target: For 4954(S): Windows Firewall Group Policy settings have changed.

segment.source: The new settings have been applied.
segment.target: The new settings have been applied.

segment.source: Unfortunately this event generates every time local Group Policy is refreshed and does not indicate that settings really were modified.
segment.target: Unfortunately this event generates every time local Group Policy is refreshed and does not indicate that settings really were modified.

segment.source: Typically this event can be ignored.
segment.target: Typically this event can be ignored.
